/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting on the right side of the frame, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, warm light.
